title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be displayed even when dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: As part of the template requirements, the UI should not perform any validation. The group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not set.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 2. Try creating a new table group.
